creator: thorsten@apache.org
text:
El mié, 30-11-2005 a las 14:00 +0100, Felix Röthenbacher escribió:
Hi Thorsten
> 
> Thorsten Scherler wrote:
> > Hi all, 
> > 
> > since cocoon-2.1.9-dev the cform example is not working anymore in
> > lenya-1.4.x. It is working fine (besides the known limitation of
> > ajax="false") with cocoon-2.1.8.
> > 
> > I wonder which changes in cocoon-2.1.9-dev may have caused that
> > ajax="false" are not working either anymore, because then we could
> > understand better the reason for 
> > http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?t=112929405800004&r=1&w=2
> 
> The reason why cforms with ajax="true" is not working in lenya
> seems clear to me: the lenya usecase framework requires extra parameter
> passing that is not (yet) supported by ajax/cforms.
>

Yeah I think so as well, to find out which ones I think we have to find out why
ajax="false" is now as well failing.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
the original issue has been fixed for a while, until cforms got broken again by
the usecase clean-up, so i'm resolving this as a duplicate of the
usecase-related bug.
i'm rather optimistic that ajax can be made to work with the new code in place.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40833 ***
